price: নিশ্চয় আমি তোমাৰ প্ৰতি পৰ্যায়ক্ৰমে আল-কোৰআন অৱতীৰ্ণ কৰিছোঁ।
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
